name: Manniquins
description:
You're in A factory Underwater and Supposed to Finish the given orders to prepare the area for the workers before they arrive at 7 Am and to make it safe for them.

Man1 Project is active during that time of the night in the factory and it's roaming to make sure the area is safe but sometimes it might go out of control and your job is to deactivate its system in order to make it safer for the workers when they arrive. You spawn in the elevator the first floor to start deactivating the circuit boards in many places. But be careful because deactivating a circuit that is already On may cause them to appear faster and could grab their attention to you.

Fun Fact: this game was supposed to be Online multiplayer game on phone and pc and it has a version that's not completed yet but for some problems I wouldn't be able to finish it, Enjoy.
